Armed with your trusty calculator and a trove of empirical equipment, prepare to combat the unknown ... by measuring it.

Research new technologies, improve your office and your factory, hire the best employees, buy other companies and build your computer empire!

name: Prima: First Rogues
description: Explore the dreamlike world of Prima in an innovative roguelike deckbuilders inspired mechanics. Immerse yourself in a magical universe, subject to the rule of chimeras. Use the strengths of your faction to gain an edge and take part in the schemes that affect Prima.

Players will play as a character that wields a warrior who is using a spinning sword, and his task is to fight mobs to survive in the arena.

name: The Last Stop

name: Uncle's Basement
description: Are you trapped in a small dark room and want to get out? You don't have much time, so hurry up! Oh, and good luck!

name: Unstrayed

name: Monster Panic
description: Fast-paced Rogue-like! Battle endless monsters, enjoy rapid Rogue-like thrills! Double the choices, unlock more classes, build unique talents! You are the hero!

name: Zombies!!! Board Game: NotDeadYet
description: An all event card expansion for the core Zombies!!! game that includes exciting new cards with all new art and new animations to tie the whole package together.

name: 8AM
description: "8AM" is a suspense game where you find yourself trapped in a room, watching a family through cameras. Without explanations, you must decide if strange events occur night after night. Being correct extends the time, seeking your release by 8:00 a.m.

name: Zombies!!! Board Game
description: Zombies!!! puts you in the middle of the action in this video game adaptation of the hit board game. In order to escape the ever advancing zombie horde, players must use a combination of wits and brawn to be the first to the heliport and certain escape.

name: Aperture
description: This is a first-person 3D puzzle game, inspired by modern societal and work-related mental health challenges. Players immerse themselves in the role of a person with mental illness, using "Aperture" to solve puzzles and uncover hidden memories.

name: The400 Mini
description:
Atari brings the computer age home. Again. Welcome back to the Atari 8 bit world of computing.
The powerful Atari 400 set a new standard of capability with its release in 1979, and along with its subsequent models, has been loved by gamers and computer enthusiasts for decades.
Now Retro Games and Atari have collaborated to create THE400 Mini. A half-sized version of the distinctively styled Atari 400, emulating the whole 8-bit Atari range from the 400 to the 800XL, and the Atari 5200 home console.
Also included is a recreation of the classic Atari CX40 joystick, with an additional seven seamlessly integrated function buttons.
Play one of the 25 built-in games, including: Lee, Berzerk, Millipede, Miner 2049er, M.U.L.E, Star Raiders II, and save your progress at any point in one of four save slots per game, or even pause and rewind gameplay to help you through the most difficult parts - a feature new to THE400 Mini.
The multi-region THE400 Mini features HD visuals output via HDMI and with five USB ports, you can connect additional controllers or a standard PC keyboard.
And as with all Retro Games releases you are free to play content you own via a USB flash drive, and learn to program in BASIC. Whether you're a seasoned veteran or a newcomer to the world of retro computing, THE400 Mini has something to offer.

name: The Forgotten Villages of Gondomayit 2" Kost Karangsari
description: Bagas, a native of Yogyakarta, is a vocational school student who lost a bet and received a challenge from his friends, he had to test his courage in one of the boarding houses in Gondomayit Village, whose residents had long been abandoned after the eruption of Mount Merapi.

name: Black Stone
description: The game will center around two investigators who uncover a profound terror while delving into consecutive disappearances. A man with a dual-layered memory, a fragmented reality, an endless rainy night... What in the world is the Black Stone? Could it possibly mark the genesis of everything?

name: 100 Rooms
description: Embark on a journey through the many rooms of this great tavern. Can you unlock it's secrets or be lost forever in the maze?

name: A Steamboat Willie
description: Sail as Mikey Mouse with steamboat willy. Move and sell cargo for money but look out for customs officers as they are out to confiscate your illegal cargo.

name: Felix the Cat
description: Join Felix on his worldwide search as flies a monoplane across mountains, delves into the ocean depths in a submarine and races across bizarre landscapes in a wild and whacky one-wheeled car! All provided by the Magic Bag of Tricks!

name: Clutter Puzzle Magazine Vol. 15 No. 1: Collector's Edition
description: By far, the most challenging and exciting Clutter ever. More fun and challenging than even Clutter RefleXIVe. You will not believe the Spot The Differences Puzzles. And wait until you see the Eyeballs!!!

name: The Journalist
description: The journalist embarks on a risky investigation.

name: Cole Dingo's Vtuber Blackjack
description: You like streaming? You like blackjack? Cole Dingo's Vtuber BlackJack is a game where you can play blackjack on stream with your audience with you as the dealer!

name: Operation Food to Gold
description: Operation Food to Gold is a free to play idle game. Produce food, feed it to the alien and collect it's golden... excrements.

name: Other Side Of Mist And Mountain
description: In 2005, a sophomore student named Igarashi Mahane took a private train to Soukyo City. She disappeared after alighting at a station named "Kisaragi". Five years later, her lover, Yokoyama Shizuno, began investigating the case and strange stories started to unfold one after another.

name: Model Human
description: Dive into Model Human, where platforming meets programming. Solve puzzles, learn coding basics, and guide protagonists to freedom in a visually striking world. Are you ready for this innovative gaming experience?

name: Daldzah
description: Daldzah is an adventure inspired by the Nart Sagas, following the journey of a child and a deceased deity to the top of a mountain. Warm your surroundings, burn obstacles in your path, and help the North Caucasian deities on your way to reunite child with his parents.

name: Lunar's Chosen: Episode 2
description: Lunar's chosen introduced a world of magic, danger, romance and sex. With a whole host of changes and improvements, animations and HD renders, the story continues in Lunar's Chosen Episode 2!

name: Giant Hornet
description: Giant Hornet is a simulator of the survival struggle of a newborn hornet against many enemies in the deadly forest to become a giant queen hornet.

name: The Stalked
description: Escaped from Liam's obsession, Kate seeks refuge in her grandpa's mansion. Strange occurrences raise questions about Liam's presence or another figure. Unraveling mysterious letters, Kate embarks on a journey, seeking peace.

name: Vellum
description: Dive into magic tomes to discover pages of increasing power, sling ink-infused spells, and choose how your foes evolve - as a group or solo!

name: Li'l Red
description: Hop, skip, and jump with Lyra as she journeys back to her homeland in this retro adventure. With harp in hand, no foe is a match for Lyra and her animal friends.

name: My Pleasure: Season 3
description: Welcome to the third and final season of My Pleasure, a choice-driven adult Visual Novel, full of hot women, mystery, and sex! This VN is packed with high-quality graphics, a rich story, humor, and hot close-up animations!

name: Under The Yoke
description: Under The Yoke is a 2D medieval peasant life-sim. Make your mark in the Domesday book as you control a family of serfs through 250 years of English history. Cultivate your lands, craft goods and hone your reputation as you navigate the tumultuous Middle Ages. Your family’s future is yours to shape!

name: Jump: Assemble
description: Anime MOBA with JUMP character!

name: Poon Puzzle
description: Poon Puzzle is a relaxing anime puzzle with cute horny girls. Solve puzzles, and enjoy high-quality animated artworks!

name: Missile Dancer 2
description: Missile Dancer 2 is a new sprite scaler shmup that combines rail shooter and caravan STG.

name: Tiny Chaos
description: Fast-paced Action Rogue-like. Fight Hordes of Monsters and Bosses. Survive, Level Up, Upgrade Attributes and Skills.

name: Zen with a Pen
description: Embark on a mesmerizing journey. Draw lines, guide the enso symbol, and conquer challenging maps. With a minimalistic style, casual (sometimes) yet addictive gameplay, this game offers a perfect blend of relaxation and arcade fun. Can you master each level and achieve true serenity?

name: Keys and Kastles
description: Welcome to Keys and Kastles, a simple but very challenging platform game! Go through different stages and try to look for hidden treasures! Be careful as there are traps around every corner! Good luck!

name: Claw Machine Sim
description: Physically accurate claw machine simulator!

name: ANIDU: Animal Dust Puppet’s Adventure
description: A:nidu is a two-player online co-op game about the adventures of animal dolls in a virtual world. Utilize each doll's unique superpowers to solve puzzles and explore.

name: Hunchback's Dungeon
description: Destroy hordes of enemies in this top-down roguelike arena shooter. In Hunchback's Dungeon, you play as a deformed, magic-wielding human who can control up to 4 different spells. Unlock new characters, collect unique items, equip powerful spells, and survive until the end.

name: We Are Not Alone
description: We Are Not Alone is a new twist on horror that combines first person exploration and third person point and click adventure. As a member of a "safe" isolation experiment you'll explore an underground facility, solve puzzles and uncover the mystery of an unknown creature. Just don't make eye contact.

name: Radirgy 2
description: Radirgy 2 is the long-awaited sequel to the arcade-style shoot 'em up Radirgy, returning to its roots with classic vertical scrolling gameplay. Players choose between two ships, one with traditional controls and the other offering twin-stick mechanics.

name: Cirrus Business
description: Help Cloudi and friends restore their home in this whimsical story-driven farming adventure. You’ll learn that growing and managing magical crops while defending against the slobsters isn’t a breeze, but very serious business.

name: Dungeons of the Obelisk
description: A 2D, turn based, dungeon crawling, loot grinding adventure.

name: Peraglees: The Ooloufian Resistance
description: Peraglees - The Ooloufian Resistance is the first furry fandom video game to kick-ass and chew fur! With retro inspired visuals and authentic FM music to keep the action pumping while you blast through hordes of enemies. Peraglees is an Action Arcade shooter with RPG elements in Story mode.

name: Just Another Night Shift
description: Just Another Night Shift is a casual competitive PvP stealth strategy game. Join us for hours of fun gameplay with your friends!

name: CD 2: Trap Master
description: 3D tower defense + roguelike deckbuilding: Craft a deck, lay out traps, ward off enemies, and navigate through the map until you confront the boss! Make use of a variety of funny & creative traps to shoot, stab and scorch enemies and guard the peace of the universe!

name: Unsolved Case: Murderous Script - DLC
description: Detectives often have to dig through other people's dirty business, but it makes their job more fun. Explore additional locations with various secrets and achieve new goals!

name: Omega Crafter
description: Adventure in a vast open-world survival craft game with your programmable sidekick Grammi! Program the Grammi to collect materials, build your town, craft weapons and armor to challenge strong enemies! Play alone or with friends online!

name: Maniac
description: Survival get-away with an ever-increasing cast of law enforcement. Level up by public property destruction, police kills and pedestrian murders. Classic GTA reimagined as a survival chase action + roguelite elements.

name: Fantasy Madness: Bloodbath
description: Fantasy Madness: Bloodbath is a roguelike action-survival game where forces of nature fight against hordes of evil. Gain new skills, loot powerful items and defeat all who stand in your way… By all means!

name: Godsworn
description: Godsworn is a classic mythological RTS. Experience an epic fantasy retelling of the northern crusades, where pagan gods and their tribes clash against crusaders and armies of heaven. Choose a divine hero, rally worshippers alongside mythical creatures, and smite the unworthy!

name: Adventure of Rikka: The Cursed Kingdom
description: The kingdom had not always been a peaceful place, over a hundred years ago there was a forgotten event that took place to thwart the darkness and bring in prosperity and peace. The king called all willing to stand up for their kingdom to once again banish the curse which laid upon the land.

name: One Last Breath
description: A 2,5D adventure set in a world in which almost no life is left you will play as Gaia, a being born from nature's last wish with power to influence the surrounding nature in order to face a dark world while being chased by strange creatures.

name: Furtive
description: Prisoners of war, your team was captured but on the run on a large military controlled island. Explore, gather resources, build a shelter and survive the dangerous military presence on the look out for your team in this epic first person, multiplayer, open world, survival adventure.

name: Open Roads
description: Long-lost family secrets. Hints of a hidden fortune. And miles to go before they sleep. Tess Devine’s relationship with her mom has never been easy, but they’re about to set out together on a journey into the past that they’ll never forget.

name: Pepper Grinder
description: Pepper Grinder is an action-packed pirate adventure starring the titular Pepper, a seafaring soul with a passion for prospecting, and Grinder, her super-powered drilling device.

name: Houmatsu Tunnel
description:
There's a tunnel that is rumored to allow you to meet a dead person if you pass through it at 2am.
After hearing this, Kyoka, decides to go to the tunnel with his boyfriend Yukio, but...

A short BL visual novel.

name: Along Came Treble
description: Along Came Treble is the first and thus far only book of the Along Came Treble series.

name: Intruder
description:
Welcome to the neighborhood! You started working from home and bought a new house, far from the city.

But something seems off about it. Just be cautious, and don't believe in fairytales.

name: Turnabout Detectives Redux
description: A remake of Turnabout Detectives, with new a script, improved audio and visuals.

name: AAA Clock: Extreme Definitive
description: Sin descripción

name: Crazy Pinball
description:
The Pinball fever of the 80's in your console!!!

A new arcade machine store has opened in your neighborhood.

The best pinball players are crowding in front of the machines trying to get the best score possible!

Play any of the three new machines in the scene, from the simple but addictive "Wild Saloon" and "Sport Bets" to the biggest challenge known in pinball machines, "Pink world", not for the faint of heart!

Share your records and compete against other players, your scores are saved for the posterity.

Were you penalized in your youth for playing too hard? In Crazy Pinball the machines do not punish strong hits. No fear!

And when you have achieved a record in the three pinball machines, try a hidden arcade classic, too good to be missed!

name: Barn 51
description:
Fed up of filing complaints from local ranchers whose cattle was abducted by aliens, the CIA launched project Barn 51. It consisted in a team of bionically enhanced farm animals specifically trained to hunt down aliens.

Take control of Combat Cow, Scuba Sheep, Hoverin Hog and Rocket Rooster in this fast paced Alex Kidd in Miracle World hack.

name: Endoom Mapping Contest 2024
description:
The ENDOOM Mapping Contest 2024 was an event organized by endoomer, the member of LegacyZ and the Russian Doom Community, on Doom Power forum. The task was to create a brand new level in a decent period of two months on a favorite theme, using any suitable resources, formats (from the list) and source ports. The map creation period lasted from January 3, 2024 to March 3, 2024.

All maps were divided into two independent groups corresponding to their formats.
Classic group: Vanilla, Limit-removing, Boom, MBF21.
Modern group: ZDoom, GZDoom, Eternity, Zandronum.

name: Le Gars Qui A Fait Doom
description: "Le Gars Qui A Fait Doom" Level Collection is a series of 8 new Ultimate Doom maps for Limit Removing ports. They come in all styles and colors, and all of them are more or less inspired by John Romero, whether it's his old IWad maps, his modern offerings (SIGIL and its sequel), his other games, or even his real life. You can play each of these maps in any order you fancy, as there's no clear theme or difficulty order. Each wad can be played standalone, à la Master Levels, and some of them contain new textures and resources.

name: Escape From Sunveil Starport
description: Escape From Sunveil Starport is an MBF21 compatible mini-wad spanning 9 or so maps, initially created during NaNoWadMo2023. This project serves as a prequel to A2Rob's NaNoWadMo 2022 contribution, Machete. Initially, their plan was to ape off level concepts from Knee-Deep in the Dead.

name: Teeny Tiny Trains
description: You're the conductor of your very own miniature railway empire. Place tracks on the board, connecting them to guide your tiny trains from one station to the next. Starting with simple rail pieces, you'll engineer a network that's both functional and fantastic, steering through challenges and chugging towards success.

name: Smash Remix: Shino Patch
description: An unofficial mod for Smash Remix which adds new playable characters: Ryu and Ken from the Street Fighter series and Cloud from Final Fantasy 7.

name: Forza Motorsport: 2020 Lexus #14 VASSER SULLIVAN RC F GT3
description: Forza Motorsport 2020 Lexus #14 VASSER SULLIVAN RC F GT3

name: Royal Roads Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Priministar
description: Sin descripción

name: Project Shoreline
description: Explore, Clean & Restore as a Cute Character in this Cozy Cleaning Mini-Adventure!

name: Furious Flappers
description: Your Flappers are furious and ready to kick some Hog butt. Help them destroy the evil Hogs and bring peace to their world!

name: String Theory
description: String Theory is a colorful puzzle game about matching a given pattern by building it out of different colored shapes.String theory has 60+ handcrafted puzzles, daily challenges, free play modes, and a level editor, making for hours of fun.

name: Warframe: Dante Chronicles Pack
description: Bring the power of the Warframe chronicler, Dante, to your Arsenal along with a devastating Incarnon Melee Weapon and his signature Customizations!

name: Duplicate Dissolution
description: Multiply your mind. Overcome a variety of trials using your trio of digital duplicates in this first-person puzzle game. Explore intricate, neon-lit rooms and unravel the mystery of the simulation and its enigmatic warden.

name: Not Alone: Classic
description: Not Alone is a single-player horror simulator in which you play the role of 45-year-old Mortie Jones. You learn that your mother is dead and your father is missing. Your task will be to spend the night in your old family home.

name: Matsutake Game
description: Aim for a high score by creating large matsutake mushrooms! Stick mushrooms together to evolve them!

name: The Finals: Bank Rabbit Set
description: The Season 2 Bank Rabbit bundle includes: - Bunny Outfit - Hide Easter Egg Emote - 2 400 Multibucks

name: C.R.O.W. Girl Trouble
description: A highschooler who moonlights as an assassin is tasked to deal with a dealer.

name: Cazzarion: Space Ace
description: Face off against swarms of enemies, as you try to avoid them while collecting power ups and weapons.

name: The Colonists: New Lands
description: Expand your frontiers with The Colonists: New Lands! Improve your transport network with Bridges and Train Tunnels, boost your economy with the Mint and even allow your bots to discover their spiritual side…

name: Fission
description: When the ball hits a fungus, the fungus disappears and the ball bounces back. The game is completed when all the fungi on the screen disappear by repeating this process. When the fungus disappears, a capsule that fission the ball may be dropped. There are 9 stages in total.

name: Casual Mahjong
description: A single-player Japanese Riichi Mahjong game. After intense battles with real players, why not enjoy a relaxed and delightful match?

name: Terra Memoria: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Not Tonight & Not Tonight 2
description: Not Tonight is a post-Brexit management game, fusing a time-pressure RPG with a politically charged story where every decision matters.

name: Psychometric Personality Profiler
description: This is a very interesting personality Test made to specifically suit you as the Perticipant. Please be honest about the answers and take your time. And by all means don't take your eyes off the screen...

name: Mystery Box 5: Elements
description: Explore a new series of intricate boxes filled with alluring enigmas and brain-teasing challenges that will leave you a lasting impression

name: Your Majesty
description: Enter your name and start your own dynasty. Rule your empire and choose between developing technology or culture, governing diligently or lazily. Through a series of memorials and decisions, you will determine the fate of your nation.

name: Hebereke: Enjoy Edition
description: Where am I pyooooo??? Hebereke is back and so is his great and surreal adventure! A mysterious little creature Hebe fell into a mysterious world. Discover a brand new world, explore every corner, find the treasures with your new wonderful friends, and use their skills to find new places.

name: OG Puzzlers: Synthwave Knights
description: OG Puzzlers: Synthwave Knights is an puzzel game with cool knights in an stunning synthwave style. You have to assemble a single image from random generated indivdual pieces. Combine all of the smart singel frames into one big image and unlock the next level.

name: Billy's Game Show
description: Billy wants you to play a game, a game where only one of you can leave alive. Many have come and gone. Now it's your turn to unlock Billy's twisted truth.

name: Destroy Them!
description: In Destroy Them, you need to destroy all the robots on 4 differents maps using advanced movements to earn points and beat your high score !

name: Please Stop Crying
description: Please Stop Crying is a lighthearted horror game about a father taking on housework and babysitting all at once.

name: Shade Hunters
description: Reclaim a silenced research laboratory from a mysterious threat. With randomized skills for each run, hard-hitting combat, an original soundtrack, unlockable characters, variable difficulty levels, and plenty of secrets to be uncovered, this roguelite RPG offers laughs and challenges for all comers.

name: Legend of the Sword
description: Legend of the Sword is a casual survival game. In the game, players first need to ensure their survival. The operation of the game is very simple. Clicking the left mouse button is the operation of the sword. Clicking the right mouse button is, homecoming, the operation

name: Hulzuyot: Horror Game
description: You are a salary man who will experience terrifying situations due to a special illness, all while carrying out household chores.

name: Boxhead: Immortal
description: A deadly plague arrives as a falling meteorite lands at BOXHEAD World. Mankind with blood type B gets infected by the plague and becomes zombie like creatures. You who are trying to survive must shoot your first bullet, and trigger any explosive materials to demolish in this bloody battleground.

name: Bot Patrol
description:
Bot Patrol is a puzzle adventure about a small worker bot on its path to freedom.
Beyond traditional sokoban mechanics, Bot Patrol features abundance of extended elements, that make achieving the goal a lot trickier. Conveyor belts, cranes, energy barriers and button triggers and not at last the evil guard drones are added into the mix.
Bot Patrol is visually polished, hard but fun puzzle challenge, but not a rage inducting repetition machine - it comes with a gracious infinite Undo and Level Reset mechanics, to always be able to take that one step back, that went to far.

name: Soul Wizards & Rogulite
description: Adventurers led by a mysterious girl take on the challenge of a labyrinth that reshapes itself with every entry, aiming for the deepest layer. This title is a new kind of RPG that introduces soul-like and rogue-lite elements into a Wizardry-like 3D dungeon RPG.

name: Shoot The Barrel
description: Shoot the Barrel game. In this top down shooter you are the protagonist fighting against the barrels. 1. Shoot the incoming barrels in this runner shooter game 2. See how far you canget 3. As you survive the barrels become harder to destroy 4. Gather teammates and fight the barrels together

name: Cabbage Crop
description: Plant and grow fresh crops to wield them as swinging or throwing weapons in this simple tower defense game! Protect your house and magic pet chicken from invading animals, and unlock new types of crops each stage to give your opponents a varying taste of cultivated pain!

name: Honkai: Star Rail - Into the Yawning Chasm
description:
Version 2.1 of Honkai: Star Rail, which includes:
• New characters: Acheron, Aventurine and Gallagher
• New Trailblaze Mission: The Devil in Velvet
• New areas: Clock Studios Theme Park and Dwlight Pavilion
• New event: Vignettes in a Cup
• New quality of life updates
• …and more!

name: To Be In Love With Girls Group
description: "To Be Love With Girls Group" is the world's first real-life interactive video game for nurturing girl groups, produced by "Guanghe Media". Game players will take on the role of a girl group agent from the first perspective in the game to search for and discover girl group trainees

name: Worst Coach in the World
description: Ready to leave skating forever, Valentina starts her first job at a resort, only to be reassigned as its rink manager.

name: Fancyland
description: After breaking in to an abandoned indoor amusement park, finding clues and solving puzzles, you soon realize that your investigation is not just a search for answers, but a desperate struggle for survival against a sinister force that lurks within.

name: Outflow
description: Experience Atlas’s journey in the future world to save his planet. Beat the enemies with unique mechanics and explore a huge open world in this action RPG.

name: Buckshot Arena
description: Play Russian Roulette in western setting with a shotgun loaded with live and blank shells. Use items to gain a tactical advantage. Fight against friends or random people at the same table of up to 8 people and become the last survivor with full pockets of money.

name: The Last Explorer
description:
Discover an alien world, study and befriend creatures and take beautiful photos along the way.

Explore an open world full of creatures to learn more about, find all the wreckage from your spaceship and use your camera to learn more about the creatures, the world and how you got there.

Throughout your journey you'll be able to do quests for the aliens or just play minigames with them.

Use your camera to take beautiful photos and analyze your environment. Throughout your journey you'll find new effects to take even better and more unique photos.

There are many different creatures you can study, photograph and befriend. Photograph them to learn more and use bait to befriend and ride them.

Find out how your ship crashed and what happened to the other astronauts by exploring the island and photographing the wreckage to analyze it and learn more.

The Last Explorer features:
- A beautiful open world you can explore any way you want
- Complex creatures to study and befriend
- Small side quests
- A highly customizable camera system
- Many interesting camera effects
- Old spaceship wreckage to learn more about
- A mystery to uncover
- Land, Air and Water creatures
- Xbox controller support

name: The Wrath of the Goose King
description: The Wrath of the Goose King has been unleashed and it's up to the red pandas to save the day! In this rogue-lite adventure you recruit adorable and cunning Pandamembers to fight the geese in turn-based combat. Will you be the one to save pandakind?

name: The Children of The Woods: Lost Tape
description: Playable trailer for the upcoming horror found footage movie "The Children of The Woods"

name: Clean The Sea!
description:
Embark on a voyage of environmental salvation and collection with Clean the Sea!—a compelling experience now on Steam.

In a world where the oceans are burdened by humanity's neglect, Clean the Sea! challenges you to pilot a lone vessel on a noble quest: cleanse the waters, rescue marine life, and turn the tide on pollution. As you navigate through tranquil yet troubled waters, your mission is not just to collect refuse but to catalyze change—one scoop of trash at a time.

name: Piecing It Together
description:
Piecing It Together brings jigsaw puzzles to a whole new dimension!
Reassemble beautiful handcrafted dioramas in 3D!
Enjoy a quick puzzling session with just a handful of pieces, or challenge yourself with many!

name: Voice Love on Air
description: This game is a BL dating sim game with a unique twist of voice acting and studio management elements. The story tells how Aki, a new voice director who has to complete several BL Dramas, and the charming voice actors fall in love with each other.

name: Mortal Kombat 1: Janet Cage Kameo
description: Announced for the Mortal Kombat 1: Kombat Pack, Janet Cage is a gender swapped version of Johnny Cage from an alternative timeline that is being added as a Kameo Fighter. The character appears during the final chapter of the story mode in cutscenes and as an opponent for some characters.

name: Emotional flow
description: A precision platformer game where there is no jump button!

name: Cannot Contain
description: Cannot Contain is a horror game set in an underground containment facility with point-and-click style elements combined with free-roam. As a new security guard, you must maintain the facility and ensure the containment of all residents, while also trying not to die in the process...

name: Unleaving
description: A child is tempted one last time by life's mystery and illusions to journey into a surreal world challenging ideas of everything and nothing

name: Dyschronia: Chronos Alternate - Dual Edition
description: As the Clocktower bell tolls, your fate hangs in the balance. Solve an impossible murder case in the far-flung future in this VR & Non-VR investigation action adventure!

name: Geneforge 2: Infestation
description: Wildly open-ended fantasy adventure in a unique fantasy world. Use battle or diplomacy and trickery to change the world, served by an army of custom-made mutant monsters. Almost 90 zones to explore and 50+ hours of gameplay. Enormous range of abilities, factions, quests, and paths to victory.

name: Dollar King
description: Cute & cool cat politicians battle in this deck-building game! Play unlimited against players worldwide in this online two-player game! Win by collecting more votes than your opponent using a variety of cards!

name: AutoForge
description: In AutoForge you will build an expansive automated factory reaching up to the sky and deep into the ground, unlock and explore regions of a vast world filled with wonder and danger, upgrade yourself with ancient technologies, and then defend it all from the unfriendly denizens of the world.

name: Terra Memoria
description: A shortage of magic crystals and the sudden awakening of ancient robots leads six new friends on an incredible investigation across Terra – a cozy and fantastic world that combines 3D and pixel art.

name: Forgotten Journey
description: Explore an open world with a vibrant ecosystem, learn more about the creatures, the world and take beautiful photos along the way.

name: Vikings: Valhalla Saga
description: Realistic Historical Role-Playing Game

name: The Magical Mixture Mill
description: Brew magical mixtures for the local adventurers - and get them hooked! Team up with a mushroom-loving witch to restore her run-down shop. Build automated production lines, experiment with exotic ingredients, explore a cozy world - and try not to blow everything up.

name: Distant Bloom
description: From a world in ruins to a world in bloom. This serene management game lets you explore an alien planet where things have gone amiss. Harness the power of plants to restore the environment and build a flourishing community with your crewmates.

name: Virtual country: Yuan fairy summon
description: Team game War chess: MMORPG + Catch pet + TCG + MOBA. Fast paced, slow games, Easy to use, difficult to master. Loss mechanism, life mechanism. Open world, free trade. R & D, production , free trad

name: Castle Constructor
description: Choose your Blocks, Build your Castle, Save the Kingdom! Design a castle using a modular system of blocks. Fend off waves of enemies who will try to climb over and break through your defenses. From lowly soldiers to powerful siege weapons; defeat them all as you strive to protect your kingdom.

name: Blood nor Water
description: Blood nor Water combines real-time with turn-based tactics for a new kind of tactics rpg. Take control of a small company of young fighters trying to make a difference as the world descends into warfare around them.

name: Engine Room
description: Fight your way through hostile space while managing a fragile ship from its heart - the Engine Room. Retreat to upgrade the ship or push your luck further into enemy territory for better rewards - or maybe get blown to pieces! Fight bosses, balance power, and manage supplies to stay alive!

name: Unwilting
description: Explore the unwilting gardens in this relaxing first person gardening adventure game!

name: Minecraft: Hermitcraft Season 9 Map
description:
Discover the crafty world of Hermitcraft: Season 9 with this free map. This world was made by a remarkable group of over 25 creators over two years, using only survival mode, in season 9 of Hermitcraft.

There are tons of megabases, minigames, and secrets to explore. Dive into their blocky builds and start your own adventure today!

name: Prayers a Thousand-fold
description: Short little cinematic. Some origami creatures get into some shenanigans. Probably.

name: Backpack Brawl
description:
Explore the immersive world of Backpack Brawl - a dynamic inventory management 2D auto-battle strategy game.

Unleash your strategic prowess as you purchase and craft potent items to achieve success in the game. Keep the momentum going by growing your inventory, expand your backpack capacity, and adapt to any challenges that lie ahead.

Placement matters! Putting the right items next to each other makes all the difference. Play smart and you'll do well.

Play against other players. You play against other players who have had the same opportunities as you. See what they come up with, and counter them! You might even learn some new tricks looking at what they do.

Choose between multiple Heroes to help shape your available items and inventory and choose the direction you like! Are you a spell-slinging elementalist? A hardy warrior? A long range marksman? As more heroes join the Brawl, the heroes you meet only get more challenging.

Fight your way to the top of the rankings!

name: Memories
description: A nostalgic level that takes inspiration from the classic Duke 3D maps.

name: Find Your IF
description: Find Your IF is a browser-mobile game based on the movie IF. The game is an augmented reality experience that uses your devices camera to find imaginary friends from the movie in the real world.

name: Uzzuzzu My Pet: Golf Dash - Premium Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Moves Away
description: Moves Away is a psychological horror. The story is told from the perspective of Dave, an ordinary man who bought an auto repair shop.

name: Stellaris: Rick The Cube Species Portrait
description: An exclusive portrait for you species, to play as the most enigmatic species in the galaxy.

name: Fallout 76: Atlantic City - America's Playground
description:
Atlantic City – America’s Playground is a free update for Fallout 76 and with it comes new questlines, open exploration of Atlantic City and a season full of adventurous rewards.

America’s Playground brings you back to Atlantic City, where Mayor Tim, in charge of the local Municipal Government, asks you to deal with the Overgrown threat that is taking over the flooded city center. Don’t forget to bring your gardening shears.

Meanwhile, in Appalachia, the Russo family has evicted the Mothman cultists and turned the Ingram Mansion into a swanky night club. They seem to be doing well after escaping their blood-stained past in Atlantic City, but beneath the surface of their glamorous exterior, the Russos are harboring some dark secrets, and they need your help.

There’s a lot to dig into in this update, and along with new quests, we are introducing free exploration of Atlantic City! There are even new side quests that you can pick up from the ever-optimistic Jeremiah Hopkin’s bulletin board in the Whitespring Resort, so make Atlantic City your next vacation destination. Take your time, wade through the flooded streets, stroll along the boardwalk and stop to smell the Overgrown.

name: Fallout 76: Season 16 - Duel with the Devil
description:
Season 16: Duel with the Devil's theme is an epic fight between Rip Daring (of Astoundingly Awesome Tales fame) and the Jersey Devil! It released March 26, 2024 alongside the "Atlantic City -- America’s Playground" free update.

Fear not! This season, the astoundingly awesome and unfailingly patriotic Rip Daring is duking it out with the Jersey Devil. No one but the burly hero--and Nurse Guinevere and Percival--could stand toe to toe with the fearsome cryptid stalking New Jersey.
Except you, Vault Dweller. You, too, can don the outfit of the famed cryptid hunter and take down devils with an all-new weapon, Cremator! Once unlocked, the Cremator will be craftable and moddable at Weapon Workbenches once you hit level 30. This season, you can also unlock Adelaide, the amazing Assaultron actress who will adorn your C.A.M.P. and deign to sign autographs for all her adoring fans.

You will also notice some changes to Seasons. The Scoreboard has been replaced by pages where you can see all the rewards that are available. As you complete challenges and earn S.C.O.R.E., you will rank up and unlock new pages. For each rank, you earn 25 tickets. You can then redeem those tickets for rewards on pages you have already unlocked.

name: Panties Attack
description: Experience the risqué fun in "Panties Attack," a match-3 puzzle game featuring increasing challenges and tantalizing rewards. Conquer all stages and claim irresistible erotic images of beautiful anime girls!

name: Hentai Nurse
description: Hentai Sport is a jigsaw puzzle. You must use your wisdom to put the puzzle back to its original shape.

name: 10 Advices
description: 10 Advices is a short atmospheric, 1st-person puzzle platformer about making video games, with precious advice from amazing creators.

name: Reading World VR
description: Step into Reading World VR, where learning to read is all about having fun! Reading World VR is a literacy game that combines fun mini games with reading to help players sharpen their skills. Learn sentence structures, spelling, syllables, and more in a fun new way!

name: Fortress Duty
description:
A bone-chilling experience based on Team Fortress 2 and inspired by the I'm on Observation Duty game series.
Search for and fix anomalies on familiar maps. Pay attention to every detail, and try not to look into the eyes of those who shouldn't be there. Survive until 6 AM.

name: Big Pharma + Bio Inc. Redemption: Symptoms and Treatment Bundle
description: Find diseases and create cure for them!

name: Bulwark: Falconeer Chronicles Origins Bundle
description: Contains Bulwark: Falconeer Chronicles and The Falconeer.

name: Money Hog
description: An evil witch has turned you into a pig! You have to collect a million dollars (two million, if playing on hard) in this platformer before midnight, otherwise you shall remain a pig forever.

name: Bob Invasion
description: A great danger appears when powerful aliens invade, and only one person is capable of stopping them. Wield your great hammer and save planet Bearth from a Bob invasion.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Battle Stage: Fallen Prayer, Engulfed Lives
description: The additional battle stage "Fallen Prayer, Engulfed Lives" becomes selectable in-game.

name: Millennia: Eagle Archers & Wolfpack Warband
description: Elevate the presence of your units in Millennia with the exclusive Wolfpack Warband and Eagle Archers clothing.

name: Forza Horizon 5: Acceleration Car Pack
description: Step on the gas and start running with the four speed legends included in the Acceleration Car Pack: 1967 Shelby GT 500, 2021 McLaren Sabre, 2022 Ford #4 Pro Electric Supervan and the 2019 Ginetta G10 RM.

name: Bulwark: Falconeer Chronicles - Dreadnot Day One DLC
description: A powerful Naval Commander who protects your trade routes using the overwhelming firepower of the Imperial Dreadnot - available to unlock and hire in the Soul Tree once an Imperial population of 210 has been met

name: Backrooms: Eternal Shadows
description: Journey back into the abyss with "Backrooms: Eternal Shadows," an expansion that plunges you even deeper into the mysterious and twisted world of the Backrooms. As you step into the unknown, brace yourself for a haunting experience that transcends the boundaries of reality.

name: 挂姬恶魔 - 怠惰之主：贝利尔
description: "Beelzebub" is a warrior-type character, delivering high damage while also having decent survivability. As the Lord of Sloth, she not only can push back enemy actions but also induces the "weakened" status upon foes. Radiating with feminine determination and unique charm, she exudes her own charisma

name: Room
description: I thought it was just an ordinary day, but I accidentally entered this endless cycle of rooms. Among the countless terrifying and anomalous things, there is a girl who seems like she shouldn't exist here.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Character 12: A.B.A
description: This allows the character "A.B.A" to be used in-game.

name: Dog: The Dog Takes the Hindmost
description: Looks like Ludo, but it's DOG. In this game, you also have to safely bring your four game pieces into your home area. The difference is that they are moved using cards that have a few surprises in store for you. Team spirit is important, because you can only win together.

name: Nine Lives Ninja: Explore!
description: Take control of a cat (who also happens to be a ninja) in this platformer with metroidvania elements! Explore the ancient cave system and find new powers to help you overcome obstacles in your search for the Fountain of Kitty Youth.

name: South Park: Snow Day! - Digital Deluxe
description: Sin descripción

name: South Park: Snow Day! - To Danse with Ravenous Shadows
description: School is cancelled and Henrietta is bored. Join her efforts to pierce the veil and she will allow you to “Danse with the Ravenous Shadows” of South Park.

name: South Park: Snow Day! - Underpants Gnome Cosmetics Pack
description: Elevate your style with The Underwear Gnome Cosmetics Pack! Unleash your fashion creativity with a trendy Underwear Gnome hat, a stylish beard, a vibrant and a green tunic.

name: South Park: Snow Day! - Cred Pack
description: A kid today is defined by their hydration drink – and their swag. Impress your friends and show the world how much CRED you have. The CRED Cosmetics pack gives you plenty of cred with a fresh hairstyle, a CRED hoodie, and a cape.

name: South Park: Snow Day! - Season Pass
description: Continue your Snow Day adventure with a Season Pass for SOUTH PARK: SNOW DAY! which includes and all-new Game Mode, New Weapons, a Weapon Variation, and Cosmetic Packs.

name: JR EAST Train Simulator: Rumoi Line (Fukagawa to Rumoi) Kiha 54-500 series
description: The Rumoi Line is a 14.4 km long JR Hokkaido line connecting Fukagawa Station in Fukagawa City, Hokkaido to Ishikari-Numata Station in Numata Town, Uryu County, Hokkaido. This DLC includes the up and down lines between Fukagawa and Rumoi (total length 50.1 km), including the discontinued section.

name: Arma 3: Creator DLC - Reaction Forces
description: When the call comes, nothing is more important than how fast you react. Make use of unique assets in several new game modes and let your quick thinking show while in the heart of action.

name: Restaurant Health Inspection Simulator: Sanitary Service
description: Explore, Inspect, Report: Master the Skills of a Restaurant Health Inspector.

name: Last Case of Benedict Fox: Definitive Edition
description:
Take on the last case of Benedict Fox and dive into a twisted world of secret organizations, forbidden rituals, and cold-blooded murders. Explore the memories of deceased victims as you search for clues and fight demons in this fantastical Lovecraftian Metroidvania.

The Definitive Edition brings new animations and upgraded AI, topped by new stories to discover filled with brand-new puzzles.

name: Thanks Mom
description: "thanks mom" is an adventure game where you control a baby. You are given milk by your mother and sleeping soundly. In your dream, you remember the trials and tribulations that happened in the past. It may have been the days of struggle before you were born.

name: Dragons Legacy
description: Dragons Legacy is an online creature survival game set in a large, beautiful, sandbox open world with distinct dragons. Rule the world as a Flame Stalker, Shadow Scale, or Acid Spitter Drake!

name: Hamburg: Neue Burg VR
description: Hamburg 1000 years ago: an immersive Virtual Reality Experience with a lot of interactive stations and a detailed reconstruction of a castle and the harbour in the year of 1024. Roam around freely or follow the guided tour in English language.

name: Hero's black dungeon
description: Hero's black dungeon is a 2D action roguelike. Take control of a young adventurer who travels to the Mediterranean lands in search of adventure and glory. On your way you will meet quite a few enemies and interesting characters. Arm yourself with magical blades and chop down enemies on your way!

name: Crystal Guard TD
description: Stop hordes of robots from destroying your Crystal shrine in this random shop tower defense game! Instead of choosing exactly what tower to place down, the random shop gives you 3 random towers to choose from. Set up your defenses and see if you can survive!

name: OG Puzzlers: Synthwave Monsters
description: OG Puzzlers: Synthwave Monsters is an puzzel game with scary monsters in an stunning synthwave style. You have to assemble a single image from random generated indivdual pieces. Combine all of the smart singel frames into one big image and unlock the next level.

name: Weed Harvest
description: Drive harvest machine in this simulation game where mission is to cut weed

name: Climb Challenge: Find Items 4
description: Hidden-object adventure game. The player needs to run around the location and look for objects in secret places, climbing into them along walls and ledges.

name: Climb Challenge: Find Items 5
description: Hidden-object adventure game. The player needs to run around the location and look for objects in secret places, climbing into them along walls and ledges.

name: Fly Hands
description: Embark on an journey through the skies in this immersive physics-based flying game - exclusively designed for VR enthusiasts

name: Color Splash: Dinosaurs
description: Color Splash: Dinosaurs is a charming and relaxing puzzle game that will lift your spirits and take You into the world of adorable dinosaurs and art. Venture into the gallery, where you will find many extraordinary and colorful dinosaurs paintings.

name: Parking Driver
description: Parking simulator, come and challenge it now

name: Train Sim World 4: Fife Circle Line - Edinburgh: Markinch via Dunfermline & Kirkcaldy Route
description: From the Scottish Capital to the Firth of Forth Lowlands, embark on passenger services over iconic cantilevers and along picturesque coastline. A modern ScotRail Turbo stars in the spotlight of Rivet Games’ Fife Circle Line in Train Sim World 4!

name: Asterball
description: Enter the galactic gridiron field as a Sportsman to beat your opponents in the fast-paced sport of Asterball. Play in a PVP setting where two teams battle it out in the field to see who can win with the most touchdowns.

name: Limb From Limb
description: The Raymond Mitchell Association personally invites you to join our new limb regrowth program. Engage in a game of chance against another patient, risking the loss of your fingers. We have provided items to aid in your success waiting to be uncovered as you traverse the game board.

name: Sultan Jumps
description: Sultan Jumps is a difficult challenge. A long and frustrating climb awaits you to save your grandchild. While controlling the Sultan, you must make difficult jumps and endure the harsh words of this grumpy grandmother.

name: Call of the Wild: The Angler - South Africa Reserve
description: Explore South Africa and catch unique new fish species with your friends. Complete missions at Fishing Hubs for rewards and discover breathtaking landmarks.

name: BouncingBalls
description: You will start with a weapon in a kind of training box with the sides slanted. Then balls fall from the sky that you have to hit, big balls that are easy to hit and small balls that are difficult to hit. Try to get as far as you can and don't let the balls hit you

name: Exit: Left or Right
description: You can go left or right, but remember, a mistake will cost you your life…

name: Boomeroad
description: BOOMEROAD is an exhilarating action-adventure game in which players slide along boomerang rails you will create. The game is set in an ancient ruin floating in the sky, and the player slides through the vast skies at their own will while searching for the Artifacts.

name: Nottolot
description: NOTTOLOT is a robot hacking action game. Your character can take over enemy robots and use their special abilities to escape from the factory.

name: Doronko Wanko
description: 『DORONKO WANKO』 is a DORONKO Action Game. In this game, You can become a cute, innocent Pomeranian, make your master's home messy and dirty. "Will the master be angry with me?" Don't worry. Because you are a sweet doggie.

name: Electrobasis
description: Electrobasis is a 3d dialogue-driven game, sprinkled with platforming and puzzle quests. Meet a cast of heavenly hosts that come with a MYRIAD of issues, and help to fix (most of) them! The casino yearns for a savior - she awaits a restoration.

name: Zerko
description: A puzzle game filled with shapes, numbers, and a straightforward goal: make every number zero.

name: Shockman Collection Vol. 1
description: ~ Cyber Citizen Shockman + Cyber Citizen Shockman 2: A New Menace ~

name: 3D Chess Q14
description: Extended 3D Chess with new figures and complex boards-sizes. Play from 6x6 to 16x16 boards. Additional Figures: Wizard, Gamma and Keeper. Play online, offline or against AI Single board games and hierarchical 3D games. Be the one that beats the most opponents.

name: Loop Theory
description: Loop Theory is a horror game in which every minute spent in the game changes your idea of the story. Take on the role of a character with a mysterious past and find out about what happened.

name: Farming Simulator Kids
description: Child-friendly & colorful introduction to farming.

name: Planet Zoo: Console Edition - Deluxe Edition
description: For players looking to expand their zoos with even more animals, scenery and gameplay scenarios, the Deluxe Edition includes 16 additional animals and two additional scenarios, which transport players to both the heart of the tropical rainforests of Southeast Asia and rich, vibrant wetlands.

name: Planet Zoo: Console Edition - Ultimate Edition
description: The Ultimate Edition includes all Deluxe Content, plus a Season Pass granting access to 14 future console DLC packs

name: Planet Zoo: Console Edition
description: Build a world for wildlife with Planet Zoo: Console Edition. From the developers of Planet Coaster and Zoo Tycoon, the ultimate zoo simulation is arriving on console. With full controller support, powerful creative tools, plus years’ worth of features, content, and animals, there’s never been a better time to dive into Frontier’s celebrated creative management game.

name: Contraptions Collection
description: Contraptions is a physics-based puzzle game with a fun cartoony look. This game takes 3 games; Contraptions 1, 2 and 3 and combines them into one value pack of FUN!

name: Skullgirls: Marie
description: She lived long enough to become a villain, but died to become a hero: at long last MARIE joins the Skullgirls cast! This DLC includes Marie, her new stage, 29 palettes, character tutorials/trials, and full Story Mode.

name: Hydroplane: Riptide Racers
description: Hydroplane: Riptide Racers is a fast paced arcade racer. Race through the canal streets of Nautica to earn parts and piece together your ideal speed boat. Blast, jet, float, navigate, and dominate your way to first place to unlock equipment to play how you want.

name: Armored War
description: Armored War is a hardcore tactical first-person shooter set in the realities of modern conflict. Take part in ground battles using a full arsenal of weapons and equipment.

name: Daria: A Kingdom Simulator
description: Daria: A Kingdom Simulator is an epic 125,000-word interactive fantasy novel by Mike Walter, where your choices control the story. It's entirely text-based—without graphics or sound effects—and fueled by the vast, unstoppable power of your imagination.

name: What the Crow?!
description: Be a crow and cause destruction in this small Playdate game.

name: Roll the Ball
description: Balance, pace and win the race! Embark on a thrilling journey with Roll the Ball! Dive into vibrant visuals across three unique biomes as you race against the clock to reach the finish line. Choose from three engaging game modes, Time Rush, Challenge and Speed Run and try to reach the top!

name: Mister Versatile: Driller's Turn
description: Mister Versatile and Driller should be enjoying life now that they've reunited and become lovers. However, Driller starts acting off and then dumps Mister Versatile without warning! After that, Mister Versatile learns Driller has returned to his life of crime! Why would he do this?! What's going on?

name: Hide for Cat: All for the Best
description: A talented cat hides "floors and walls" This game is a 2D puzzle action game where you aim to clear the world in a world where the terrain changes exactly as you see it by hiding floors and walls so that they are no longer visible.

name: Millennia
description: Create your own nation in Millennia, a historical turn-based 4X game that challenges your strategic prowess across 10,000 years of history, from the dawn of humanity to our possible futures.

name: South Park: Snow Day!
description: Join Cartman, Stan, Kyle and Kenny, in three-dimensional glory, to celebrate the most magical day in any young child’s life - a snow day! Grab up to three friends and battle your way through the snow-piled streets of South Park on a quest to save the world and enjoy a day without school.

name: Blood Midnight Blossom
description: A visual novel with a breathtaking story about two very different girls who unexpectedly find themselves connected to each other.

name: Necrosmith 2
description: Like a dead man reanimated by dark sorcery, the necromancer simulator is back! Give the undead the ability to fly over mountains and swim across rivers, explore a fully generated world at night and fend off enemy hordes during the day. Start a new, uhm, life.

name: The Settlers: New Allies - Deluxe Pack
description: The Settlers: New Allies Deluxe Pack includes in-game content and digital items.

name: Engineered to Purpose
description: A sci-fi tower defense game where the player designs their own towers to control how they defend against attackers.

name: Bulwark Evolution: Falconeer Chronicles
description: A new city-building game set in the oceanic world of The Great Ursee, by BAFTA-nominated developer Tomas Sala. Design, develop and defend your Bulwark, manage resources and make choices to create unique fortress settlements in a world reeling from a cataclysmic war.

name: Wrestling Cardboard Championship
description: In the WCC, cardboard boxes with unique skills and moves, fight in large arenas based on Madison Square Garden, Arena Mexico and the Tokyo Dome.

name: Outpost: Infinity Siege
description: Command Mobile Outpost and take Protoslag Gun to venture deep into the Signet surveillance off-limit area where dangers lurk in the dark. Collect unique Weapon Units. Amp up the firepower of the Outpost that fights with you. This game is about TD, FPS, and RTS all at the same time.

name: Go Fight Fantastic!
description: Go Fight Fantastic! is a 3-player Action-RPG with heavy focus on teamwork and co-operation! Play as three unique characters (Tank, Striker or Healer), each with his/her own set of abilities - both over the Internet or with friends at home (couch co-op).

name: SCP: Blackout
description: A VR/Desktop game where you are a new D-Class personnel in a secret SCP research facility when everything falls apart. Use what you can find as you explore the facility, access logs to learn about the SCP entities in containment, and run for your life from the SCP entities that have escaped.

name: Jigsaw Masterpieces 2: Additional Puzzle Pack Set Vol.2
description: Sin descripción

name: Sprout Valley: Ultimate Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Five Nights to Remember
description: It's been three years since the tragedy. The newly established Fazbear Ent. has attempted to turn the public perception of the once-beloved Fredbear's Family Diner around with a hit show and a new line of animatronics, and they want you to join the Fazbear family as a night watchman.

name: The Angry Turnabout
description: Sin descripción

name: Defender FX
description:
Defender FX is inspired by the classic game.

Your planet is under attack! Save the treasures from being stolen.

name: Ninja Kato 3

My Neighbor Enide is a short light horror-themed RPG game. This game is dialogue heavy, and plays out more like a visual novel with light RPG elements.

The game takes about 40 minutes to 1 hour to complete. There are two endings: One normal ending and one true ending.

Once you get home from work, you'll have your sister to attend to. She's a very sickly girl who needs a lot of help. Manage your household finances well, build up your relationship with your sister, and who knows, perhaps you might even be able to solve the mystery behind her illness.

name: RestorArt: Fairwood Hills - Collector's Edition
description: Embark on a captivating journey as an art restorer in the charming town of Fairwood Hills. Uncover hidden stories as you mend torn canvases, remove stickers, and restore burnt edges.

name: Space Moves
description: Space Moves is a sci-fi puzzle adventure game that features a unique game mechanic where enemies move in sync with the main protagonist (grid based movement mechanics).

name: Picket Puzzle
description:
The picket line swells as factory after factory walk out on strike. For the exploited and the oppressed of the world, this is the moment -- but time is short. The arms of the state are mobilizing to halt your advance. Can you lead the workers to victory?

A unique snake and sokoban puzzler with lots of clever mechanics in the mix.

name: Slime Rancher Rainbow Bundle
description: First developed by Monomi Park in 2016, Slime Rancher is a charming, award-winning, multi-million selling, sandbox adventure that will transport you into the immersive world of Rainbow Island.

name: A Game Called Paako: The Game Called Paako
description: The Game Called Paako is the game about how A Game Called Paako ends.

name: Drift Legacy
description: Epic Drifts, Legendary Roads: Your Journey Begins Now!

name: Brain Memory 2
description: Enhance your memory every day and become a master!

name: NightGhast
description: NightGhast is a first-person horror game about wicked witches and sinister widows...

name: Learn to Play Vol. 1: Fruit Collect
description: Sin descripción

name: Machick
description: Defeat the heavily armed army of anti-magic toads and free the forest from destruction. Machick is a casual game where you craft your own wands, vanquish enemies, collect XP, and choose upgrades to go further on the journey.

name: Cronus Monument
description: Sin descripción

name: Desert Bus Frontiers
description: Welcome to Desert Bus Frontiers, the action-packed 580 km long trip from Tucson, Arizona to Las Vegas, where Literally Nothing Interesting happens.

name: Heaven Jump
description: Take an adventure with Heaven Jump, the endless jumping game! Fly to new heights in this fun challenge where you'll try to reach the highest score and collect stars along the way. Dive into the world of Heaven Jump, where classic 2D pixel arcade design adds a touch of nostalgia to your space journey. Elevate your gaming experience and reach for the stars.

name: Multi Maze 3D: Roll Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Solar System Simulator
description: Gravity and exploration sandbox

name: Starfall Odyssey
description: Explore planets, battle space pirates, uncover the universe's secrets in Starfall Odyssey's epic cosmic journey.

name: The Alchemist's Apprentice in the Maze of Madness
description: A loveletter to the dungeon crawler genre, filled with procedurally generated mazes, mix and match puzzles, traps and upgrades.

name: Reaper Survivors
description: Are you ready to defy the ravages of time and emerge as a true survivor?

name: Border Mountain
description: "Border Mountain" tells the story of four adventurers at the Herac Camp, who embark on their adventure after a war between the Imperial Army and the legion of monsters. Players will journey with them through snowy mountains, explore mysterious caves, and ultimately find their own path of adventure.

name: Shining Girls
description: Shining Girls is a relaxing puzzle game and multiple unique sexy girls.The game is a jigsaw puzzle, where players move puzzle pieces to restore the original image.

name: There's No Easy Wayout 99
description: An amazing adventure game. Sometimes as a RPG and Humour game aswell .

name: Shinkansen 0
description: Shinkansen 0 is a Japanese horror game set on a Shinkansen (Japanese bullet train).

name: Snip It!
description: A 2D Qix-like retro arcade game. Draw lines to capture the canvas and defeat enemies!

name: Puzzle Adventure VR
description: Embark with us on a journey in Puzzle Adventure VR! A classic match blocks type game, for the first time in VR. Crush colorful blocks in a cartoon-styled VR world. Relaxing and intuitive, perfect for all ages, offering a blend of tranquil visuals, engaging puzzles, and a soothing soundtrack.

name: Merk Mayhem
description: Get ready for a thrilling semi-futuristic shooter game! Choose from three kits, master movement speeds, and restore armor with drops from fallen enemies. Casual or competitive, suit up for a battle like no other.

name: Just Stack
description: Just Stack is a simple and addictive casual game where you stack randomly spawned objects as high as possible. Challenge your limits to see how high you can stack surreal objects using Unreal Engine 5's beautiful graphics.

name: Dark Deception: Monsters & Mortals - US Creator
description: The US Creators Pack is a brand new DLC for Monsters & Mortals that adds the popular American YouTube Creator, CoryXKenshin, to the game!

name: Desert Witch
description: An open-world action game in which you eliminate enemies with a sniper rifle, often from very long distances. The game area is a desert locally built with low and high buildings in which you can hide or take a shooting position.

name: Got Simulator
description: Hatsune Miku invades the earth in this action game. You can grow your hair and destroy the buildings and more...

name: Paws in the Maze
description: "Paws in the Maze," a thrilling adventure where you take on the role of a big-hearted pitbull on a mission to rescue two lost puppies trapped in a vast, dark labyrinth. As the brave protagonist, you must rely on your keen senses and powerful bark to locate the wayward pups and guide them to safety.

name: Milky Way TD Survivors Autobattler RTS: Earth
description: Milky Way is a unique mix of Tower Defense, RTS, Auto-Battler and Survivors. Build your base, choose random upgrades and use powerful skills to survive against hordes of enemies.

name: From Soil to Bottle
description: Experience the art of winemaking like never before From Soil to Bottle. Dive into a realistic sandbox simulator where every decision shapes your wines. With endless possibilities, embark on a journey to become the ultimate winemaker!

name: Lost In Failures
description: It is a survival, adventure, and action game set in a living and challenging open world. Experience the legendary journey of David, who suddenly woke up on an unfamiliar beach surrounded by a forest filled with mysteries and threats. He will need to explore and fight to regain his normal life.

name: Kawaii Puzzle: Girl Adventure
description: Engage in exciting puzzles with charming anime girls, progress through new levels, participate in dialogues, and earn well-deserved rewards! Embark on adventures with adorable anime characters awaits you

name: Essence Bloom
description: Essence Bloom is a linear, story-focused indie visual novel that allows the player to experience a world with beautiful cherry blossoms and fun times with friends....

name: Troy: The Soldier
description: Troy, a turn based RPG with Rougelite aspects, is a game based around your use of cash and how much you waste. With an emphasis on music and it's Gameboy-like art style, Troy acts as a playable mixtape for whoever wants to listen to some tunes as well as play a game.

name: Total Rush
description: We've fused Card Gaming with the Battle of Total War to create the ultimate multiplayer strategy game. Combine a unique deck from different factions, rally your legions, and charge to defeat all your opponents!

name: Tower Doomer
description: satisfy your demolishing urges with Tower Doomer ! Complete levels in various environments with limited strokes or create your own demolishing derby in the sandbox mode. Tear down multiple structures by shooting at them or use gravity at your own advantage !

name: Dr. What & Detective Son
description: Join Dr. What and Detective Son on an exhilarating journey through mind-bending puzzles and perplexing mysteries in this immersive logic game! With multiple levels to conquer, sharpen your deductive skills and unravel intricate cases.

name: Aurans
description: Aurans is a kinetic visual novel, meaning it is linear and with no choices. It is a story about coming of age, learning to believe in yourself, and finding out what really matters to you. Everything is fully hand drawn, and is the first visual novel project of Pixelsplosion Studios.

name: Idle Fairy Fantasy
description: Class dark brush game, equipment driven, there are combat AIDS, liver can be placed

name: Battle Room Beta
description: Join the action-packed world of BATTLE ROOM BETA! Jump into the game right away, no preparation required! Explore different maps, team up with your friends and dominate the competition by making best use of the unique features of your chosen character!

name: Gold Scrapping Simulator
description: Transform e-waste into gold in this captivating life simulator. Dive deep into the intricate world of electronic recycling, upgrade your tools, and strike fortune. Uncover the secrets of tech wealth in a thrilling quest for precious metals

name: Shadow of Engimor
description: Shadow of Engimor promises an enthralling and deep storyline, a captivating world, and colorful adventures. Get ready to immerse yourself in dark mysteries and thrilling moments in this captivating 2D game. Demonstrate your skills and cleverness by diving into the world of Shadow of Engimor.

name: Pinballtoon
description: Pinballtoon is a Pinball game.

name: Virtual Girlfriend Dating Simulator
description: Navigate the complexities of young love in a vibrant college setting. Every choice shapes your destiny in this captivating dating simulation game!

name: Dea
description: Turn-based fantasy RPG that takes place in Lastia, the last piece of land on a world that survived a great war and is now facing a new threat: strange creatures named Xempts.

name: Real Estate Simulator
description:
Embark on an exhilarating journey to build your real estate empire in "Real Estate Simulator," a deep and dynamic business simulation game. Begin as a small-time property investor and strategize your way to become a tycoon in the cutthroat world of real estate. Navigate market trends, negotiate deals, and outsmart competitors in this immersive simulation experience.

Interactive NPC Negotiations: Engage with a range of NPC clients, from cautious first-time buyers to wealthy investors. Understand their needs, negotiate terms, and close deals that shape your path to success.

️ Property Development and Management: Purchase, renovate, and sell properties across the city. From cheap living areas to luxury skyscrapers, each property brings unique challenges and opportunities.

Intuitive Controls and UI: Whether you're a seasoned tycoon or new to business sims, intuitive controls and a clear user interface make managing your empire accessible and enjoyable.

Unique Challenges and Achievements: From market crashes to VIP clients, face unique challenges that test your strategic prowess. Unlock achievements and make your mark in the world of real estate.

name: Dragon's Dogma II: Deluxe Edition
description: Dragon's Dogma 2 is a single player, narrative driven action-RPG that challenges the players to choose their own experience - from the appearance of their Arisen, their vocation, their party, how to approach different situations and more - in a truly immersive fantasy world.

name: Lady of Hwarang
description: “Training after test? Stop the shoot!” Right after university examination, the car accident led me to a ghost claiming I muredered her 1,400 years ago. Solving the mystery is the only way to go back… wait, by traveling all the time back and training with Hwarangs? My new life has just begun!

name: Hitman: World of Assassination - The Undying Pack
description: Unlock a series of cosmetics inspired by The Undying Elusive Target mission and gain permanent access to The Oroborous - A three-level Arcade contract featuring The Undying Elusive Target.

name: TekSkeleton
description: TekSkeleton is a hardcore platformer of the Tek line. Run, jump, kill enemies, and avoid obstacles through 5 hand-crafted levels, enjoy the atmospheric retro graphics in the dungeon style.

name: La Voix
description: Navigate complex relationships and unexpected revelations as a transfer student with amnesia in this visual novel adventure. Uncover the truth behind a mysterious dream and the wishes of the campus crush.

name: The Hell Inside
description: An action roguelike about escaping familiar places. Use your book to survive hordes of enemies and add new pages to the book to change how it works. Escape The Hell Inside.

name: Eye see fun
description: "Eye See Fun" is a casual adventure and puzzle game with the main character being an eye. Players engage in the game by manipulating the eye and interacting with objects in the scenes to solve puzzles and unlock different environments. The goal is to help the eye find its companion.

name: Climber Animals: Together
description: Climber Animals is a challenging and dynamic parkour game for 1-8 players. In this game,overcome obstacles and climb to the top with your friends. If you fall, your progress is lost and you start over. Keep your balance on this challenging climb and compete with your friends to reach the top.

name: Rise of the Ronin: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
Japan, 1863. After three centuries of the Tokugawa Shogunate’s oppressive rule, the Black Ships of the West descend upon the nation’s borders and the country falls into a state of turmoil. Amidst the chaos of war, disease and political unrest, a nameless warrior forges their own path, holding the very fate of Japan in their hands.

As a masterless warrior – a Ronin, your destiny is your own. See the story unfold in different ways depending on the choices you make and the characters you ally with along the way. Face critical mission decisions – like whether to assassinate or protect key figures, and shape the course of history through a rich multi-choice system.

name: Backrooms: Steps into the abyss
description: You are a member of the B.E.I. research team. You have to find a lost report.Your task is to explore these primitive spaces, find the report and return them to the base for further analysis. Use your ingenuity and skills to avoid danger.

name: Aery: Ancient Empires
description: In Aery - Ancient Empires you play as a little bird-like spirit that watches ancient civilizations evolve. You will discover unknown, giant, and beautiful environments and you will be able to enjoy the feeling of flying while exploring a whole world filled with beauty and little secrets.

name: Adventure boy
description: Adventure Boy is a pixel style 2D board adventure game. The character will automatically move and attack enemies, and skills need to be manually cast. Job transfer provides professional weapons and skills, paired with different weapons and skills to create your own professional genre.

name: Narita Boy: Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Under The Mask
description: You will become a returnee from the underworld whose soul resides in a mask. Extract the mask, explore the surrounding area, encounter events, and continuously become stronger! At the end of time, use the masks you collected to give the final enemy a fatal blow! ! !

name: Blasphemous 2: Limited Collector's Edition
description: This Physical Edition includes a Steelbook case with exclusive artwork, a printed instruction manual created by the developers along with a thank you letter from the Game Kitchen team, a Marca del Martitio metal coin, three art cards with new illustrations, two CD’s of music composed by Carlos Viola along with a collector’s CD cover with code to download the digital soundtrack, a printed game guide with over 60 pages of Blasphemous lore a beautiful album of illustrations and a certificate of authenticity all housed in a specially created premium finish collector’s box.

name: Bloody Ink
description: Bloody Ink brings your nightmares to life. Constant terror at home, mysteries to solve, and vocal interaction. Collect items, uncover Luca's past, and face your fears.

name: Swing By
description: Spin you ship around planets and collect as many valuable prizes as possible

name: Kill Invaders
description: Dive into a thrilling multiplayer FPS with an alien storyline. Defend Earth in a battle against extraterrestrial invaders!

name: Circus of TimTim
description: Circus of TimTim is a Stealth Horror Survival Game about two siblings trying to sneak inside the most hunted carnival of all time to recover lost items with a metal detector device, however enemies are roaming around and they can hear your every step! TimTim is not happy ..

name: Miss Neko: Pirates
description: Pirates ahead! The pirate girls on Skull Island have yet to witness the true extent of your prowess, Captain. Can you conquer them one by one with your skills and plunder that precious treasure onto your ship?

name: Super Kawaii Ninja
description: Super kawaii ninja is a single player arena fps.

name: Descent from Arkov's Tower
description: Highly moddable retro roguelike. Descent from Arkov's Tower - or die trying!

name: Cureocity
description: “People think battles need powerful weapons, but strategy at hand is key."The story follows a rookie adventurer and a new healer in a dungeon quest, with the core gameplay involving hand-picked methods using weapons and items. Fight or purify? Heal or alter? The choice is in your hands.

name: The Holyburn Witches
description: An atmospheric survival-horror game made from chilling panoramic photographs and terrifying sound design. According to old Scottish folklore, witches haunt the forests of the accursed village of Holyburn.

name: Daemon Sigil
description: Defend your village from an eldritch invasion in this creature collector, turn-based card battler. Train your favourite characters through a Roguelite upgrades system. Assemble a formidable daemon squad and journey to an otherworldly realm to close the last portal!

name: Wishbound Desires
description: Embark on a visually stunning 2D roguelike deck-building adventure set in a Japanese-inspired fantasy world. Strategically craft your card deck during battle, enhancing and personalizing the cards with powerful rewards, and embark on an enchanting journey filled with mysteries and romance.

name: Cozy Room Decorator
description: Step into the world of Cozy Room Decorator where you’re the chief curator of cozy and it’s up to you to define what cozy means. Whether that means a lived-in kitchen space filled with sweets, or a tech-laden game room, the combinations are waiting to be explored. Dive into a world of boundless imagination and creativity with a treasure trove of hundreds of items, each brimming with endless possibilities. Equipped with your very own room, this whimsical isometric room design game invites you to unleash your inner interior decorator.

name: Enigmarble
description: Dive into a masmerizing world of puzzles and challenges in Enigmarble, a puzzle game that will test your wits, reflexes, and problem-solving abilities! Play through 80+ levels spanning across 5 visually immersive themes.
